availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hezekiah H. Dick (Pulaski County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Pulaski County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Carolina Adams Dick. Father of America Dick, Fanny Dick, and Alex H. Dick. Farmer in Pulaski County in 1860. Justice of the peace for District No. 3 (Buncomb) in Pulaski County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 77; Find A Grave, "Hezekiah H. Dick (1827-1909)," Memorial #42769534, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=42769534&ref=acom (accessed May 9, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0383.
